instructions: heat soup in saucepan on the stove.  Pour in the milk and stir.  Ready to serve when steam is rising from the soup.
on medium-high heat, melt the butter in a frying pan until barely a liquid.
put a slice of bread in the frying pan.
put cheese slices on it, covering the bread.
cover the pan and wait 5 minutes.
remove the bread from the pan, melt another tablespoon of butter, and put the sandwich into the pan with the other side face down.
serve when both sides are golden brown or when the cheese super gooey.
